item.title: Marcopolo G7 1050 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 4, 2025

Marcopolo G7 1050 v1.0 ETS2

The Marcopolo G7 Viaggio 1050 mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) is one of the most popular and sought-after buses by the Brazilian community of the game. It represents a real model from Marcopolo, a Brazilian bus manufacturer, and offers a more immersive simulation experience for those who enjoy driving buses in ETS2.

What to Expect from a Mod
A good Marcopolo G7 Viaggio 1050 mod usually offers:
Detailed Modeling: A faithful representation of the real bus, both exterior and interior, with high-quality textures.
Multiple Chassis Configurations: The mod can come with chassis options (such as Scania 4×2, Mercedes-Benz O500RS, Volvo B340R) to simulate different versions of the bus.

Extensive Customization:
Skins: Various liveries of real or fictional bus companies.
Interiors: Color options for seats, curtains, interior flooring, and dashboard details.
Accessories: Digital signs, optional mirrors, interior and exterior lights, door and window animations.
Sounds: Realistic engine and gearbox sounds, specific to each chassis.
Animations: Some more advanced mods include passenger animations, tachograph, animated DVD, and even animated dirt.
Compatibility: It is crucial to check the compatibility of the mod with your Euro Truck Simulator 2 version (e.g. 1.34, 1.40, 1.44, 1.49, 1.52, 1.53, 1.54). Modders frequently update their work to the latest versions of the game.

How to Install the Mod
Download the file: The mod will come in .scs format.
Move to the mods folder: Copy the .scs file to the Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod folder.
Activate in the game: Launch ETS2, go to the “Mod Manager” in the main menu, find the Marcopolo G7 Viaggio 1050 mod, activate it (by moving it to the right column) and confirm the changes.
Buy the bus: In-game, go to a mod dealer (or the chassis brand dealer if the mod is integrated with one) to purchase and customize your bus.
Always choose to download mods from trusted sources to ensure the security of your files and the stability of your game.

Credits: CONVIVEU DO REI

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Vw 18.310 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 4, 2025

Vw 18.310 v1.0 ETS2

Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS 2) is a truck simulation game that allows players to drive trucks on European routes. The VW 18.310 model is not a truck available in the base game of ETS 2. To have this truck in the game, you need to install a mod created by other players.

Credits: MARCOS PROENÇO

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.description:

Sport Cars Traffic Pack by TrafficManiac v12.7.8 ATS

Lexus LFA, SC430, LC500, SC300, RC F
Lotus Exige S Roadster, Evora, Elise(’99, ’05, ’17), Exige ’06, Espirit ’02, Evija
Lucra L148
Maserati Gransport, GranTurismo, MC12, Spyder
Mazda RX-7, RX-8, MX-5(’94, ’01, ’07, ’15)
Mazzanti Evantra
Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG GT, SLK(R171, R172), SL(R230, R231), SLR McLaren Roadster, AMG GTR, CLK63 AMG, CL55 AMG, CLK GTR, 190 Evo II
McLaren 570S, P1, 720S, F1, 12C, 675LT, Senna
Mitsubishi Eclipse(’95, ’03, ’12), Lancer Evo(III, V, VI, IX, X), Starion, 3000GT, FTO
Morgan Aero SuperSports

Nio EP9
Nissan GT-R, 350Z, 370Z, Z
Noble M600, M12
Pagani Huayra, Zonda
Panoz Esperante
Pininfarina Battista
Pontiac GTO, Solstice, Firebird ’02
Porsche 911(996 GT2, 997, 992), 718 Boxster, Carrera GT, Cayman(981, 987), 959, 944, 918, 968
Rezvani Beast Alpha
Rimac Concept One, C Two
Rossion Q1
Saleen S7
Saturn Sky
Savage Rivale Roadyacht
Sbarro Alcador
Scion FR-S
Scuderia Cameron Glickenhaus SCG003
Spada Vetture Sport Codatronca
Spyker C8 Aileron, C12 Zagato
SSC Ultimate Aero
Subaru Impreza WRX STI(GM, GD, GH, GV), BRZ GT
Suzuki Swift Sport ’12
Toyota Celica(’92, ’94, ’03), Supra(’92, ’98, ’19), MR2(’89, ’95, Spyder)
Tushek TS900 Apex
TVR Sagaris, Tuscan, Typhon
Ultima GTR
Vencer Sarthe
W Motors Fenyr Supersport, Lykan Hypersport
Wiesmann MF3
Zenvo ST1

All standalone.
Works on any maps.
Compatible with AI packs by Jazzycat.
For version 1.55.x
Included two versions: for use only with default traffic and for use with Jazzycats AI pack.
You must have in mod folder two files:
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_ats_base.scs
and
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_ats_def.scs (only with default traffic)
or
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_ats_jaz.scs (with Jazzycats AI pack)
If you want to have many sport cars everywhere use only one file:
sport_cars_traffic_pack_by_TrafficManiac_ats_base.scs

Version 12.7.8 – mod packed with new version of SCS Packer 1.55 (improving performance), fixed problems with some lods

Credits: TrafficManiac

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
